reviews.review_msg: Very approachable prof. Always willing to help. The course itself is very challenging but he does a good job at simplifying it. He is available almost anytime you can catch also including his Office hours. Overall, he is an awesome prof!!! Take ur Chem course with him b/c if u take it with Plettner or Kruis u'll regret it!

GREAT PROF. Explains things really well. Works really hard to make sure you understand the material. Very approachable and funny. Lots of notes, make sure to attend class and hid tutorials. Overall a very tough course, but if you've gotta take it - take it with him.

uber funny. Talks and writes FAST so be prepared for some hand work out! Over all, very chill, super approachable and helpful. The lecture is purely theoretical and the exams are there to make u apply the theories. BASICALLY, u're required to memorize every rxn and every reagent used. He didn't make things tough, it's just a very tough course.

Horrible prof! Mumbles like crazy and speeds through lectures.  The one midterm we had was extremely hard.  To succeed in his class you have to know the text book questions inside out.  All questions are conceptual! On the lighter side he is pretty funny.
Boring, no notes not even a proper list of topics for the course, mumbles and stumbles a lot. Generally, makes the course more boring than it already is.
